<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# IfTernary Node Formatting

Represents ternary `if` statement (i.e. `cond ? if_true : if_false`)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
foo  ? bar  : baz
```

After:

```ruby
foo ? bar : baz
```

## Formats a multi-line into a single

Before:

```ruby
foo ?
  bar :
  baz
```

After:

```ruby
foo ? bar : baz
```
